data.text:
@kuknaarjan Sir, what happened? Please DM the concern in detail along with the PNR so we may check. ~Shreya
  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@Awaaj_Janta_ki Sir, we regret the experience. Please DM the PNR so we may check. ~Shreya  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@AksshayDuragkar Sir, web check-in is not mandatory and can be done at the counters, free of cost. ~Shreya
@adh24364 Under "CPML", a complimentary snack and beverage are provided as per availability onboard. Further, we value your feedback and will share it. Hope to serve better in the future. ~Shreya 2/2

@adh24364 Sir, we regret the hassle. We do understand rude behavior is not acceptable. Our staff is expected to be courteous at all times. However, certain items are available only when they are pre-booked. 1/2

@Tapan19487425 Sir, we understand your concern and regret the experience.  Given what has already been said to you by our customer relations team, we are unable to advise you differently. Look towards your understanding. ~Shreya

@the2ndalphabet Sir, we understand your concern and request you to reach the airport ASAP. However, we're informing the airport staff but we won't be able to commit anything. Do reach out to our staff for assistance. Thanks! ~Shreya

urls.title: FAQs About Travel Certificate - IndiGo
urls.description: What is a Travel Certificate? Get help with travel certificate related queries from listed frequently asked questions. Learn more at goIndiGo.in website.

data.text: @beingshubham_g Sir, Boarding Pass can no way be reissued once the travel is complete. You may only retrieve the Travel Certificate at https://t.co/Ny9bCnv8oK on our website. ~Shreya
@KshtzG Sir, we regret the experience. Please DM the PNR so we may check. ~Shreya  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@softmoney_Din Sir, only minor rectifications are allowed in the name. Please DM us your PNR and an image of your ID Proof, so we may check and advise. Thanks. ~Navi  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc

@IndiGo6E As checked, the updated departure time of the flight is 2215 hrs and our Airport Team is there to assist the customers. You may get in touch with them for any real-time assistance. Thanks. (2/2) ~Navi
@rkk999 Mr Kothari, we regret the inconvenience caused. Our flight operations are dependent on several factors, some of which are uncontrollable and may disrupt the schedule. (1/2)

@Mahendr20379261 Mr Singh, under 'Student Discount Booking,' the baggage allowance will be of 25 kgs Check-In ( 1 piece ) and 7 kgs Cabin ( 1 piece ). Under Regular Fare Booking, the baggage allowance will be of 15 kgs Check-In ( 1 piece ) and 7 kgs Cabin ( 1 piece ). We hope this helps. ~Navi

@goawayxyz Hi, we wish you a speedy recovery and request you to DM us the PNR along with your Contact Number and Medical Docs ( Signed and Stamped ) so we may check on the same and assist. Thanks. ~Navi  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc

@bulletvish Thanks for taking out the time to speak with us. As discussed, your feedback is well noted and will be shared with the Concerned Team for further review and rectification. Wishing you a great day. ~Navi
@mishubhamm Mr Sharma, we request you to DM us your father's PNR, so we may check on the same and assist you. Thanks. ~Navi  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
Paradise found. #goIndiGo https://t.co/mLVfNhLzaU
@SubhashishGup15 Mr Gupta, we request you to get in touch with Indira Gandhi International Airport, Delhi Lost & Found at +91-9650495769 for assistance on the same. Thanks. ~Navi

@shafaug10 Mr Khan, we regret the inconvenience caused. The flight is delayed due to the late arrival of incoming aircraft and is expected to depart at 1950 hrs. Our Airport Team is there to assist you and you may get in touch with them for any real-time assistance. Thanks. ~Navi

urls.title: Manage Booking: Edit, cancel & reschedule flight - IndiGo
urls.description: Manage your IndiGo flight booking. Select a seat, edit, change, cancel & reschedule your flight. Get your travel itinerary, download ticket or print boarding pass.

data.text: @UrusaiGakai Hi, please be informed that only 1 piece of Check-In Baggage is allowed per customer on Domestic Flights. You may purchase the Second Piece online at https://t.co/6AeiBVBxXb or at the Airport. Looking forward to having you onboard. ~Navi

@ProudPSBian Hi, we wish your brother a speedy recovery and request you to DM us the PNR, your Contact Number and the Medical Docs ( Signed and Stamped ), so we may check on the same and assist. Thanks. ~Navi  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@IndiGo6E Our Airport Team is there to assist the customers and you may also DM us your PNR for more assistance. Thanks. (2/2) ~Navi  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@kalyanmannava Sir, we regret the inconvenience caused. Our flight operations are dependent on several factors, some of which are uncontrollable and may disrupt the schedule. (1/2)

@manitbhaskar Mr Bhaskar, we regret the inconvenience caused to you. The flight was delayed due to the late arrival of incoming aircraft and we look forward to serving you in a better way, next time you travel with us. ~Navi

@varungrover Mr Grover, glad to know it all worked out and our team member, Saldanha was able to assist you well. We'll surely have your kudos passed along. Looking forward to welcoming you again soon. ~Team IndiGo

urls.title: Non-standard & Special Baggage Assistance - IndiGo
urls.description: Get support and read frequently asked questions if you carry an over-sized or odd-sized item. Know what items considered as special baggage, at goIndiGo.in.
urls.unwound_url: https://www.goindigo.in/travel-information/en/non-standard-baggage.html#:~:text=Read More...-,Yes, REGISTERED drones are allowed in checked in baggage.,battery must not exceed 160Wh.

data.text: @katyalvineeta1 Hi, we request you to visit 'Can I carry a drone in checked-in/ carry-on baggage' at https://t.co/KZRuPeTO0v for detailed information on the same. Thanks. ~Navi
We are thrilled to announce that our first A321 freighter took off last week between Kolkata and Yangon. Here’s to uplifting times ahead. #goIndiGo #IndiGoCarGo https://t.co/flrj1FTswW
@bharath_r_gowda Mr Ramachandra, we regret the inconvenience and request you to DM us your PNR/ Flight Details so we may check on the same and advise. Thanks. ~Navi  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc

@nambiarnn Ms Nambiar, we regret the experience and are checking on the same with our concerned Airport Team. Please allow us some time and we'll try to update you ASAP. You may also DM us for further communication. Thanks. ~Navi  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc

@MissinghMove Ms Singh, we regret the experience and will check on the same. Your feedback will be shared with our Concerned Team and we look forward to serving you in a better way, next time you travel with us. ~Navi

domain.name: Interests and Hobbies Vertical
domain.description: Top level interests and hobbies groupings, like Food or Travel

domain.name: Interests and Hobbies Category
domain.description: A grouping of interests and hobbies entities, like Novelty Food or Destinations

data.text: @w_shaikh1934 Mr Waseem, we confirm that the information you have provided does not belong to IndiGo. It appears that certain people are fraudulently trying to collect money from you on the basis of a Fake Job Offer. Please report this with all the details at eco@goindigo.in. ~Navi

urls.title: Track Refund status for your booking online - IndiGo
urls.description: Check Refund Status - Now track your refund in easy steps online. Know your refund status for flight booking and track online at goIndiGo.in website.

data.text: @snmn77 Hello, Ma'am. A full refund has been processed from our end to the primary mode of payment on the 16th of September, 2022. Please connect with the concerned travel agency for further clarification. You can keep a track of the refund using https://t.co/z6SCIRoe0P. ~Yashica
@sajani_tush92 Good Afternoon, Sir. You can carry your electric kettle with you in your check-in luggage only. ~Yashica
@falakdesai Mr Desai, we are here and request you to DM us your PNR, so we may check on the same and assist. Thanks. ~Navi  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
RT @e4mtweets: Our heartiest congratulations to @IndiGo6E for winning the e4m PR & Corp Comm 'Top 25 Brands with best in-house communicatio…
@drsourabhroy Mr Roy, we request you to share your registered Email ID via DM so we can check and assist. Thanks. ~Ojasvi

@jaisingh1122 Sir, we always advise our passengers to report at least 2 hours prior to departure, in order to complete the pre-boarding formalities and to avoid any last-minute hassle. We look forward to your understanding. ~Ojasvi
@santoshpatra047 Sir, please share your registered email ID via DM since we are unable to retrieve details from the above-mentioned PNR. Thanks. ~Ojasvi

@choppybaba Sir, we regret the inconvenience caused. This is not the experience we intend to provide. Further, we have duly noted your feedback and we wish to serve you with a better experience next time you travel with us. ~Ojasvi

@tanoy_dewanjee Sir, we never intend to disrupt the plans of our customers. Our operations are dependent on various factors some of which are beyond our control that may affect your schedule. Further, please share your PNR via DM so we can check and assist. ~Ojasvi
@blessjake Sir, please allow us some time to get this checked. We'll get back to you with an update soon. ~Ojasvi
@ajay_gupta07 Mr Gupta, we are concerned to hear this. Please share your PNR and contact number via DM so we can check and assist. ~Ojasvi
@gowthamaithal Sir, we regret the inconvenience caused. We request you to share their PNR via DM so we can check and assist. ~Ojasvi
@mani198604 Sir, please DM us your contact number and one of our representatives will contact you at the earliest. ~Ojasvi
@iam_srivalli Ma'am, please accept our deepest condolences. We are glad our team was able to assist you with this. ~Ojasvi
@FounderJha Mr Jha, please share your contact number via DM and we'll connect with you at the earliest. ~Ojasvi

@nishant2a Sir, our team tried calling you, however, couldn't establish a connection. Please share a convenient time to speak. ~Prahlad
  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@saumyshikha Ma'am, we are concerned to see this. Please share your PNR and the copy of the PIR issued by the arrival staff and we'll get back to you at the earliest. ~Ojasvi

@sheik0395 Sir, we understand your concern. We always recommend our customers pack such things properly with bubble wrap to avoid any breakage. Further, please confirm if the same was reported to the arrival staff. ~Ojasvi
@kumarnarang8 Sir, we regret the inconvenience caused. Please help us with the PNR via DM so we check and advise. Thanks. ~Ojasvi
@atimamankotia Ma'am, we regret the inconvenience caused. Please help us with your PNR via DM so we can check and assist at the earliest. ~Ojasvi
@peterdr64 Sir, we are concerned to hear this. Please share your PNR via DM so we can check and assist. Thanks. ~Ojasvi

@rishabh9193 Sir, it is not mandatory to buy a seat. If you do not wish to pay for the seat, while doing the web check-in, please click on the auto-assign option which is available 6 hours prior to the departure and a seat will be assigned to you as per the availability. ~Ojasvi
@The_FotoVogue Hi, let us know your PNR via DM, we'll surely assist you. ~Kritika  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc

data.text:
Download Digi Yatra, click a selfie and enjoy seamless, paperless access from airport entry to boarding. #goIndiGo #Innovation #DigiYatra 

@JM_Scindia @MoCA_GoI @DGCAIndia @DelhiAirport @BLRAirport @AAIVNSAIRPORT https://t.co/UhFLvYC6F4

@NirajKu55263111 Sir, we regret the delay. We try our best to fly on time. As checked the delay is due to the late arrival of the incoming aircraft. Now the flight will depart at 1145 hours. Our team is trying its best to get you to your destination asap. ~Kritika

@ishanrakshit Mr Rakshit, we are concerned to hear this. We always aim to provide the best flying experience to our passengers. We request you to share your contact number via DM so we may connect with you. ~Ojasvi
@agrharsh Mr Agarwal, we regret the inconvenience caused. We request you to DM us your contact number and we'll connect with you at the earliest. ~Ojasvi
@Choool Sir, we are concerned to hear this. We request you to share the concern in detail along with your contact number via DM and we'll get back to you at the earliest. ~Ojasvi
@vishalshahjai Mr Shah, you don't need to worry. Our team will take good care of her. ~Ojasvi

@sharanpoovanna Sir, we do try to accommodate local language-speaking crew on all regional flights as far as possible. Exceptions occur when crew flight routes clash. Your feedback though is duly noted and appreciated. ~Kritika
@mktgbyvijay Dr Anand, we wish to inform you, to avail free seats, you may opt for auto seat assignment during web check-in and the seat will be assigned to you as per the availability. ~Ojasvi

@Pratyus67149597 Sir, it's never our intention to disrupt the plans of our customers. The delay was due to the late arrival of incoming aircraft and is now scheduled to depart at 1120 hours. We look forward to your understanding. ~Ojasvi

@diya_10 Ma'am , we never wish to disrupt the plans of our passengers. The delay was due to the late arrival of incoming aircraft. We believe the flight will be airborne any minute and hope the flight will make up for the delay. ~Ojasvi

@suvradeep16 Mr Sarkar, rude behavior is not at all acceptable. We request you to share your PNR via DM so we can share your feedback with the concerned team for review and necessary staff briefing to avoid such instances in the future. ~Ojasvi

@kpsivaram Sir, we never wish to disrupt the plans of our customers. Our operations are dependent on various factors some of which are beyond our control that may affect our schedule. We request your understanding for the same. ~Ojasvi

@ShrawanDebuka1 Sir, we never wish to disrupt the plans of our customers. The delay was due to the late arrival of incoming aircraft. We hope you will understand that many factors are beyond our control that determines our flight schedule. ~Ojasvi
@shreyasiyengar2 Sir, we regret the inconvenience caused. Please help us with your PNR via DM so we can raise this with the concerned team right away. ~Ojasvi
@Muks4sf Sir, we regret the delay. We try our best to fly on time. We request you to share your PNR via DM so, we may check and assist you further.~ Nandita   https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc

@subodhsomani Sir, our staff always tries to accept passengers reporting marginally late, however, keeping in mind the nature of our operations, it is not always possible for us to accept passengers reporting after gate closure. We request your understanding on the same. ~Ojasvi
@kamran_jahan Sir, we regret the inconvenience caused. We request you to reach out to the Airport Staff for real-time assistance. They will be happy to assist you. ~Ojasvi
@PRAVEEN456KUMAR Sir, this is not the service we intend to provide. We are raising this with the concerned team right away. ~Ojasvi
@MonkiChor_ Ma'am, we are concerned to know what went wrong. We request you to share your concern in detail via DM so, we may look into it and assist you further.~ Nandita   https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@raktimroy121 Mr Roy, we regret the inconvenience. This is not how we want to serve our customers. Please allow us some time to get this checked and we will get back to you.~Vaishali
@Thewatcher9992 Hi, we sincerely regret the hassle caused to you. We request you to write to groups@goindigo.in for assistance in this regard.~Vaishali
@ShivKum41046408 Hi, please share your concern in detail along with the PNR via DM so we may assist.~Vaishali
@Sunny_S_Gandhi Hi, please share your concern in detail via DM so we may assist.~Vaishali
@keshavkamat Sir, we're concerned to note your disappointment. We request you to share the PNR via DM so we may look into it and assist you. Thanks.~Vaishali
@piyushayodhya Sir, we're concerned to note about the issue. Could you please share your PNR so we may look into it and assist you?~Vaishali

urls.title: Book Domestic & International Flights at Lowest Airfare - IndiGo
urls.description: Online flight booking with IndiGo. Book your domestic & international flight tickets at the lowest airfare with best offers at goIndiGo.in website and app.

data.text: @Mani64920923 Hi, please know that 1 piece is allowed for carriage. You may purchase an additional baggage handling fee if you wish to carry an extra bag via https://t.co/Mj1tZ006Ne.~Vaishali
@Bizoop Sir, we regret the inconvenience. Please allow us some time to get it checked. We will update you.~Vaishali
@au_kapoor Sir, we regret the inconvenience. Please share the transaction id via DM so we may check and advise.~Vaishali
@Sunil_Daga Sir, we're concerned to note this. Please share your PNR via DM so we may look into it.~Vaishali
@carsonwaldrop Hi, we request you to share your concern in detail along with the contact number via DM so we may assist.~Vaishali
@JayeshBD Sir, we're concerned to know this. Please share your PNR via DM so we may get it checked with the team and update you.~Vaishali

@rajat_badala Sir, please know that a refund has been initiated under the PNR to the original form of payment and the same will reflect in the original form of payment within 7-10 working days. Please connect with your travel agent for further assistance.~Vaishali
@SahooBishnu85 Sir, we regret the damage. Please share your PNR via DM so we may check and advise.~Vaishali
@bhaveshcbhatia Dr Bhatia, thank you for the shoutout. We're glad to hear that our staff assisted you well. We'll definitely pass it along.~Vaishali #goIndiGo

@9222anu Mr Kumawat, while we would never want an on-board medical emergency situation, we're relieved to know that our team members were able to handle it well. We'll surely pass along your praise.~Vaishali
@reem_B86 Hi, please share your contact number via DM for clarification in this regard.~Vaishali
@suRaj_gkwd Sir, please be informed that the price of the food supply is set by the manufacturer. However, your feedback is valuable to us and the same will be shared with the team. Thanks.~Vaishali

data.text: @bytekn1ght Sir, you may carry a badminton racket in your check-in baggage. Thanks.~Vaishali
@rommeoooo Sir, we regret to know this. Please share your PNR via DM so we may check and advise at the earliest.~Vaishali
@arpitamukherjee We request you to reach out to them at 033-25691002 or 033-25691011 for assistance.~Vaishali (2/2)

@arpitamukherjee Ms Mukherjee, we tried our best to search for the bag at every possible location and regret to inform you that we were unable to locate it. Further, any item left or forgotten in the airport premises is deposited at their lost & found counter. (1/2)

urls.title: FAQs About Infants Travelling in a Flight - IndiGo
urls.description: Read all the frequently asked questions about fee for infants on-board, baggage allowance & the age group of an infant. Explore complete FAQs at goIndiGo.in.

data.text: @poojaTri19 Hi, please know that infant is not allowed in the first row. Please visit https://t.co/PYmRRPF4TW for detailed info.~Vaishali
@gsrihari1993 Sir, could you please share the PNR via DM so we may get it checked with the concerned team and get back to you.~Vaishali

@Chatty111Prasad However, we assure you that we'll certainly share your feedback with our Airport team in order to mitigate such delays and be quicker in future. Thank you for speaking with us tonight and hope to welcome you back for a more favourable experience again soon. ~Sheetal (2/2)

@Chatty111Prasad Sir, we truly understand how frustrating it is waiting for your bags. While our goal is to have all bags off the plane as soon as possible, sometimes delays occur due to unexpected challenges. (1/2)
@RSurendar92 Sir, we regret to note your disappointment. Could you please share the PNR via DM so we may look into it? Thanks.~Vaishali
